text: amazing sch, they really take the effort and time to deal w bullying issues, invite alumnis over to give tips and talks, theres sm learning journeys especially after psle, class bonding activities like class shirt making, and more, sure there's bullying, but every sch has that issue, no matter where u go. the sch is responsible and the teachers are real nice. the teacher and student bond is really good. i miss zps sm :(
